Reuben Clark Law Society   Latino Law Students Association   Law and Business Association   Law and Film Society   Law and Government Society   Law and Social Entrepreneurship Association   Law Democrats   Law Revue   Law Rugby   Law Students for Economic Justice   Law Students for Israel   Law Students for Justice in Palestine   NYU Legal Aid Chapter   Sports Law Association   Than the Sword   Law Students for Human Rights   Law Women   Law Students for Reproductive Justice   Learned Foot   Legal Outreach   Media Law Collaborative   Mediation Organization   Mental Health Law Association   Middle Eastern Law Students Association   Muslim Law Students Association   National Lawyers Guild   OUTLaw   Older Wiser Law Students   Open Meditation and Yoga Association (OM)   Prisoners' Rights and Education Project   Public Interest Law Foundation   Public Service Auction   Real Estate and Urban Policy Forum   Recent College Graduate Mentors (RCGM)   Research, Education and Advocacy to Combat Homelessness   South Asian Law Students Association   Student Animal Legal Defense Fund   Student Lawyer Athletic Program   Students for the Education and Representation of Veterans (SERV)   Substantial Performance   Supreme Court Reading Group   Suspension Representation Project   Transfer Student Committee   Trial Advocacy Society   Unemployment Action Center   West Coast Connection   Women of Color Collective               Related Links           Student Bar Association Other Student Organizations                            The Supreme Court Reading Group hosts small, seminar-style events held throughout the year that bring together students and a distinguished guest to talk about a recent or upcoming Supreme Court case. All attendees read key Supreme Court opinions and transcripts prior to the seminar. It’s a great opportunity to kick back, have a drink, and talk SCOTUS with amazing NYU professors, judges, and practitioners.   All events are open only to currently enrolled JD/LLM students; two weeks before an event, we send out a link to an attendee lottery system. If you'd like to join our listserv, simply fill out the form below. If you're having trouble with the list system, have any other questions, or would like to get involved, please feel free to email us .   Listserv Signup   Loading...   SCRG Board   President : Gabriel Panek   VP Operations : S. Riane Harper   VP Communications : Harry Black   Treasurer : Ava Ferenci   Executive Editors : Billy Goldstein and Lin Meneguin   You can contact the Board at supreme-court-reading-group@nyu.edu .
